CREATE-LEADER.TITLE: You’ve been invited to be a small group leader!
CREATE-LEADER.PROMPT: Your church wants you to have the awesome experience of building relationships with others. To make small groups easy, your church is using Smallgroups.church.
CREATE-LEADER.STEP1-MSG: Sign up for a free Smallgroups.church account using the form on this page.
CREATE-LEADER.STEP2-MSG: Include the who, what, when, where, and why. Your group will be approved by your church and will appear in the directory on Smallgroups.church.
CREATE-LEADER.STEP3-MSG: Just tell them to go to Smallgroups.church and join from the directory. Spread the word through email, social media, or a good old-fashioned conversation.

CREATE-ADMIN.TITLE: You’ve been invited to be an administrator for your church at Smallgroups.church!
CREATE-ADMIN.PROMPT: Administrators have special privileges to manage small groups. Get started now:
CREATE-ADMIN.STEP1-MSG: Sign up for a free Smallgroups.church account using the form on this page.
CREATE-ADMIN.STEP2-MSG: The "Church" dashboard is where you can invite small group leaders, approve and manage groups, and view church metrics.
CREATE-ADMIN.STEP3-MSG: The "Groups" dashboard lets you create and manage the small groups you lead. Participants can view the group's details and roster.
